behavior.name: sub-task-tracking
behavior.description: How sub-tasks are tracked as comments on the parent beads ticket. Sub-tasks are NOT separate beads tickets — they are tracked as comments to keep the ticket list clean while maintaining an audit trail.

rules.rule: After the plan is approved at HUMAN_GATE, the orchestrator posts the sub-task list as a comment on the ticket: bd comment {ticket-id} "..."
As each sub-task completes, post a status update comment: "[sub-task N] DONE: {summary of changes}"
On failure, post: "[sub-task N] FAILED: {error summary} — escalating"
During implementation, the orchestrator (team lead) updates comments as sub-tasks complete or fail
